meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one thousandth of a meter.
meanings.sent1: She measured the tiny bug with a millimeter ruler.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used a millimeter ruler to measure the length of the hair.
meanings.sent3: The millimeter ruler felt like a magic wand in her hands.
meanings.sent4: In the world of measurements, a millimeter is a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: The millimeter measurement was so small, it was almost invisible to the naked eye.

meanings.sent1: The jeweler carefully examined the millimeter diamond.
meanings.sent2: The tiny seed was only a millimeter in diameter.
meanings.sent3: The millimeter-sized hole in the wall was a mystery to the detective.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like a millimeter-sized diamond in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The millimeter diameter of the pearl made it exceptionally rare and valuable.
